COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xee
STRING: As usual, I woke up to Phorni's greeting, and got ready
for school.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x104
STRING: But bit by bit, changes were about to follow in a life
that had stayed the same until just last week.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11a
STRING: [Chris] “I may come home a little later, starting today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14c
STRING: [Phorni] “Didn't you say the same thing last week?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x162
STRING: [Chris] “Of course, I was busy last week looking for
people and so on. But from this week, I might be even
later.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19e
STRING: [Phorni] “Huh, and why is that?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b4
STRING: [Chris] “Do you think that finding someone is the end of
it? I have to practice after that, so of course I'll stay
later.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fa
STRING: [Phorni] “That's true.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x210
STRING: [Chris] “...That was easier than expected. I thought
you'd have more complaints, like 'So late' or 'Stupid
Chris'.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x256
STRING: [Phorni] “...Were you trying to sound like me?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26c
STRING: [Chris] “...I guess.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29e
STRING: [Phorni] “You should stop.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b4
STRING: [Chris] “Right, sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e6
STRING: [Phorni] “It's okay if you know it. Well, there's nothing to
be done about coming home late on weekdays, but
make sure you don't schedule practice on Sundays.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x310
STRING: [Chris] “Why not?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x342
STRING: [Phorni] “Because you'll say 'I'm tired' or 'That's it', and
then we won't do our ensembles.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x36c
STRING: [Chris] “...Were you trying to sound like me?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x39e
STRING: [Phorni] “...I'll stop.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3b4
STRING: [Chris] “Shouldn't have started in the first place.
Anyway... I can't deny that possibility, so I'll avoid
practicing on Sundays.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3fa
STRING: [Phorni] “That's good.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x410
STRING: In any case, I had no intention of practicing on the
weekend.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x438
STRING: [Phorni] “Well, you probably had no intention of
practicing on the weekend.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x458
STRING: [Chris] “...That's not true.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x48a
STRING: [Phorni] “Really?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4a0
STRING: [Chris] “Yes, really.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4b6
STRING: That was a lie, but having something like that said to
my face was bound to make me mad.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4cc
STRING: Time to settle this topic and just move on.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4d8
STRING: [Chris] “Anyway, I'll be a little late, so don't get worried.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x514
STRING: [Phorni] “Okay, okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x52a
STRING: Once in a blue moon, Phorni would get things right
away.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x540
STRING: She'd accept it when there was something I really didn't
like, or when I refused to give way.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x556
STRING: But on the other hand she could be selfish, or say things
that only got me in trouble, so it wasn't all praise from
me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x576
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, see you later.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5a6
STRING: I took a deep breath of the moist morning air and ran
out into the rain.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5bc
STRING: My letter to Arie was in my bag, where it wouldn't get
wet.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5c8
STRING: I ran to the mailbox and posted my letter, using my
body to shield it from the rain.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5f8
STRING: This letter would reach Arie, and her next letter would
reach me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x604
STRING: That cycle alone would never change.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x66c
STRING: [Cordell] “Hi!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x682
STRING: [Chris] “Good morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x698
STRING: As I was warming my fingers, Ms. Cordell entered the
classroom, a little later than me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6b6
STRING: [Cordell] “It seems you did quite a lot last week, but
were there results?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6d6
STRING: [Chris] “A lot... How do you know about that?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6f4
STRING: [Cordell] “I'm your teacher. What I should be aware of, I
am.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x714
STRING: [Chris] “...You're not really answering the question.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x732
STRING: [Cordell] “I don't intend to. So?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x748
STRING: Perhaps she'd heard it from Asino?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x754
STRING: [Chris] “Well... I don't think that my efforts were in vain.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x77c
STRING: [Cordell] “You mean, aside from Tortinita?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x792
STRING: [Chris] “Yes. For now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7c4
STRING: [Cordell] “I'm asking for names, Chris. I'm tired of your
placeholder answers.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7e4
STRING: [Chris] “Do you know a student by the name of Falsita
Fawcett?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x820
STRING: [Cordell] “Yes, I do.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x836
STRING: [Chris] “Of course nothing's been decided yet, but we've
talked about playing together.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x85e
STRING: [Cordell] “I see. And what are you planning to do, Chris?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x874
STRING: [Chris] “I don't know yet, of course. We're going to see
how we sound together some time this week; I'll take it
from there.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x894
STRING: That was supposed to be an unexpected name, but Ms.
Cordell simply nodded without any sign of surprise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8aa
STRING: Well, I'd never seen Ms. Cordell surprised before, so
such a reaction might've put me in a spot.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8c0
STRING: Oh, and then there was Lise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8cc
STRING: But this was extremely uncertain, so it was probably
better not to mention it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8fe
STRING: [Cordell] “Well, Chris, you did well I suppose, given your
track record.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x914
STRING: [Chris] “...It does feel strange, to be praised for finding
just one more candidate.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x950
STRING: [Cordell] “Did that sound like praise to you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x966
STRING: [Chris] “...No, my mistake.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x984
STRING: [Cordell] “Good. Now then, time for practice. Are you
ready?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x99a
STRING: [Chris] “Yes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9b8
STRING: [Cordell] “Then let's begin.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa10
STRING: There wasn't anything I wanted to eat, so I made do
with a simple lunch.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa26
STRING: Just when I thought it was about time, lo and behold,
Torta sat down hurriedly beside me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa58
STRING: [Torta] “Hi!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa6e
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm, morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa8c
STRING: [Torta] “Well? How did last week go?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaa2
STRING: [Chris] “Ms. Cordell asked me the same thing. And the
week before, too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xade
STRING: [Torta] “That just shows how much she cares about
you, right? You should be honored.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xafe
STRING: [Chris] “Thanks for the optimism. Well, I found one more
candidate, that's all.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb3a
STRING: [Torta] “Ah... An increase.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb50
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb82
STRING: [Torta] “Uh, nothing. So who is it? Someone I know?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xba2
STRING: [Chris] “I don't know about that, Torta, but her name is
Falsita.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbde
STRING: [Torta] “...Of course I know her. I think everyone does.
She used to be class president.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbfe
STRING: [Chris] “ So it's true.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc30
STRING: [Torta] “And? Are you going to practice together?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc46
STRING: [Chris] “More or less.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc64
STRING: [Torta] “When?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc7a
STRING: [Chris] “She said Tuesday or Thursday... Is something
wrong?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xca2
STRING: [Torta] “What about the other days?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcb8
STRING: [Chris] “She said she had some errands to run. Hey,
Torta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcd8
STRING: Why was she asking all these questions?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xce4
STRING: I wanted to ask her about it, but Torta looked down in
thought for just a second, then looked at me again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd20
STRING: [Torta] “So that means... You won't be practicing every
day, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd40
STRING: [Chris] “...No, I guess not. I might go to the practice
rooms by myself, though.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd60
STRING: Even though the chances of that happening were
almost non-existent.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd92
STRING: [Torta] “In that case... Will you practice with me? Your
song for the graduation recital, anything is fine...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdb2
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdd0
STRING: [Torta] “Erm, it's Arie's letter, she asked me to help you
out. Thing is, I'm busy with my own song, so it's not as if
I have that much time to spare.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdfa
STRING: [Chris] “...I see, she wrote it in your letter too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe2c
STRING: [Torta] “Which means, she said the same thing in your
letter.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe42
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, although I called her a busybody in my
reply.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe74
STRING: [Torta] “Well... What do we do?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe8a
STRING: [Chris] “I think it's worth a shot.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xea8
STRING: [Torta] “Then how about today, shall we practice?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xebe
STRING: [Chris] “...Today, huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf12
STRING: [Chris] “Sure, let's see how it sounds. I don't want to
give Arie even more reason to worry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf4e
STRING: [Torta] “That's true. Well then, let's go to the practice
rooms.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf64
STRING: [Chris] “Alright.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf9a
STRING: [Chris] “Nah, not today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfcc
STRING: [Torta] “Oh? Well... That's fine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfe2
STRING: [Chris] “Ah, I'm sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1014
STRING: [Torta] “No need to apologize. Let me know when
you're free. I'm free aside from Tuesday and Thursday,
so if you tell me during lunch, I'll practice with you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x103e
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah... Got it. Thanks, Torta.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1054
STRING: And... Sorry.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1060
STRING: I understood, but I hadn't worked out how I felt about it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1076
STRING: If not for Arie's suggestion, I'd have said no more easily.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x108c
STRING: Forget about me, put yourself first, or something like
that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1098
STRING: Still, it was Arie's letter that was the cause of my
confusion.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10ae
STRING: Perhaps Arie too felt that things would be easier if I
paired up with Torta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10c4
STRING: Torta, whom we knew so well, instead of someone
entirely unknown.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10ec
STRING: [Torta] “Well, I'm going to practice now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1102
STRING: [Chris] “Alright.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1126
STRING: Torta definitely didn't show it, but there was a hint of
sadness in her voice, so slight only I could hear it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1146
STRING: Perhaps the whole thing should've been viewed more
positively, more so than I did then.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x115c
STRING: Today was out of the question, but next time, perhaps
I'd try asking Torta to practice in a more upbeat way.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1172
STRING: [Chris] “Now, then...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11aa
STRING: What should I do?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1240
STRING: What should I do... But something else came to mind.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1256
STRING: That musical idea that came to me the other day, when
I was thinking about Phorni, how about turning that into
a real song?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x126c
STRING: It'd turned into a fairly upbeat melody, but my memories
of Phorni were pleasant, positive ones, so it was quite
appropriate.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x128c
STRING: I'd brought music sheets and a pen with me, and I
almost had the complete song in my head.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12a2
STRING: All that was left was to write it out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12ae
STRING: [Chris] “But...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12c4
STRING: That was a lot of trouble.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12d0
STRING: Should I ask someone to practice with me, or should I
try writing songs somewhere?
